item.title: Rainy town - Yumi Arai
item.description: 雨の街を English The dawn rain is of milk color in the quiet town While they whisper, fairies come down If someone embraces my shoulder tenderly I could walk anywhere, near or far Kissing the cosmos blooming in the garden If I come out, and open the fence door I want to go to your house and say “Good morning” I could walk anywhere, near or far The dawn sky is of grape color, a magician

item.title: Linh Tinh
item.description: Thỉnh thoảng chụp xong cũng không nhớ chụp hôm nào, chụp về chủ đề gì, tại sao lại chụp. Thôi để tạm đây vậy…
